trigger.name: ZFS - ARC meta usage too high (< {$ZFS_ARC_META_THRESHOLD}%)

trigger_prototype.name: Device "{#DEV_NAME}" has too many checksum errors (> {$ZFS_VDEV_ERROR_THRESHOLD})
Device "{#DEV_NAME}" has too many read errors (> {$ZFS_VDEV_ERROR_THRESHOLD})
Device "{#DEV_NAME}" has too many write errors (> {$ZFS_VDEV_ERROR_THRESHOLD})
ZFS - L2ARC too many checksum errors (> {$ZFS_L2ARC_ERROR_THRESHOLD})
ZFS - L2ARC hit rate too low (< {$ZFS_L2ARC_HITRATE_THRESHOLD}%)
ZFS - L2ARC too many IO errors (> {$ZFS_L2ARC_ERROR_THRESHOLD})

macro.description: Alert when ARC meta usage % goes over this value
Regexp to exclude the datasets during discovery
Regexp to include the datasets during discovery
Dataset usage in % when crit alert is triggered
Dataset usage in % when high alert is triggered
Alert when L2ARC hit rate falls below this value
Regexp to exclude the pools during discovery
Pool fragmentation in % when high alert is triggered
Regexp to include the pools during discovery
Pool usage in % when avg alert is triggered
Pool usage in % when crit alert is triggered
Pool usage in % when high alert is triggered
Pool usage in % when warn alert is triggered
vdev and L2ARC error threshold when triggers fire
Regexp to exclude the vdevs during discovery
Regexp to include the vdevs during discovery
